name: algorithmic_courtship
prompt: An app predicts ideal romantic matches with 99.9% accuracy—but one pair keeps breaking the algorithm. Write the investigation summary.
decoded:
The investigation summary should include the following information:

1. The app predicts ideal romantic matches with 99.9% accuracy.
2. One pair keeps breaking the algorithm.
3. The investigation should focus on understanding why this pair is consistently breaking the algorithm and how to resolve the issue.
